summary: Verizon is a huge American company that provides phone and internet services. It started in 1984 as Bell Atlantic in some East Coast states. Over time, it grew by merging with other companies, changing its name to Verizon in 2000. Today, Verizon is one of the biggest telecom firms globally, with over 114 million mobile customers in the U.S. It also owns media companies like AOL and Yahoo.
title: Verizon
